document.full_text: the united states violated global trade law by shutting down internet gambling sites based in antigua and elsewhere and prosecuting their owners, according to antigua and barbuda officials considering action in the world trade organization.
document.title: antigua says u.s. online poker shutdown was illegal
lines_and_colors: the united states violated global trade law by shutting down internet gambling sites based in antigua and elsewhere and prosecuting their owners, according to antigua and barbuda officials considering action in the world trade organization.
